name: Master Ball
text_desc: Catches a wild Pokémon every time.

name: Ultra Ball
text_desc: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 2×.

name: Great Ball
text_desc: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 1.5×.

name: Poké Ball
text_desc: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.

name: Safari Ball
text_desc: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon in the Great Marsh or Safari Zone.  Success rate is 1.5×.

name: Net Ball
text_desc: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 3× for water and bug Pokémon.

name: Dive Ball
text_desc: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 3.5× when underwater, fishing, or surfing.

name: Nest Ball
text_desc: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 3.9× for level 1 Pokémon, and drops steadily to 1× at level 30.

name: Repeat Ball
text_desc: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 3× for previously-caught Pokémon.

name: Timer Ball
text_desc: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate increases by 0.1× (Gen V: 0.3×) every turn, to a max of 4×.

name: Luxury Ball
text_desc: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Caught Pokémon start with 200 happiness.

name: Premier Ball
text_desc: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.

name: Dusk Ball
text_desc: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 3.5× at night and in caves.

name: Heal Ball
text_desc: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Caught Pokémon are immediately healed.

name: Quick Ball
text_desc: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 4× (Gen V: 5×), but only on the first turn.

name: Cherish Ball
text_desc: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.

name: Potion
text_desc: Restores 20 HP.

name: Antidote
text_desc: Cures poison.

name: Burn Heal
text_desc: Cures a burn.

name: Ice Heal
text_desc: Cures freezing.
